data.title: The Welding Institute
data.text:
Welcome to The Welding Institute!

The leading engineering institution supporting welding and joining professionals with welding, joining and allied technologies.

Why join?

Designed for individuals at all levels, Membership of The Welding Institute will not only demonstrate your commitment to industry and your career but may also give you eligibility to register with the Engineering Council, the UK regulatory body for the engineering profession. If you already hold registration with Engineering Council, youâ€™ll be pleased to know that the process to achieve Technician or Member with The Welding Institute will be even easier.

Our Member benefits can support your engineering career, regardless of your technical background. They are designed to help you with your career, meeting the needs of your employers, employees or clients, all whilst meeting your own personal career goals.

Join usSpeak to our membership team today
